reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had promised my girlfriend a holiday two months previously. By the time I had run out of excuses as to why not to go, I had fallen on hard times a little and so all that we could afford was a last minute package deal.
reviews.title: Excellent Location and Value
A highly recommended hotel!!!!
reviews.text: Normally I avoid package tours to tourist hotspots like the plague but, this time, I had little choice.
